txt.en: 'Ah, there you are.  Hurry along, I've been expecting you.'
'The Night is over!  They have set us free!'
'So, these are the brave adventurers?  I must admit, you look tougher than most.'
'Farewell!  Go now and find rest with your families long sundered.  I will join you shortly.'
'I'm sure you have questions... all in due time.  First, a test.'
'Excellent!  I've not seen such determination in years.'
'My name is... well, you may call me Shadow.  And these, are the Halls of Night.'
'We mustn't tarry.  We wouldn't want to make Nightmare angry.'
'Who is Nightmare?  He is... this.  Everything you see around you is his creation.'
'Impressive!  I will inform Nightmare of your arrival.'
'The dreamers have passed your test.'
'Do not heed his words.  His 'gift' is unending torment and suffering.'
'You may have the strength to oppose him.  I will open the way for you.'
'You have roused his anger, I have never seen him in such a mood.'
'Be wary!  He is more powerful than he appears.'
'I - I hardly believe it... you've done it.'
'Everyone, come quickly!'
'These adventurers have accomplished what none before dared.'
Shadow[e]
'Challenging Nightmare in his own realm and emerging the victor...'
